conbody.p: The process-generation enables the user to import platform-specific workflow models to be able to view/edit them and to generate the platform-specific models to be deployed onto the target environments. At present workflow designer has the capability to import workflow models specific to OCS Environment and generate them back.

The process-generation also provides contextual menus and the respective wizards to import and generate the artefacts. The generation templates, java helper classes and the java sources for the UI capabilities and the corresponding extensions are found in the process-generation plugin project. The process-generation is dependent on the workbench-generation plugin project.
